articles.title: Sonarika Bhadoria marries Vikas Parashar in a grand wedding. Watch viral video - India Today
articles.description: Television actor Sonarika Bhadoria got married to businessman Vikas Parashar on February 18 in Sawai Madhopur Ranthambore A video of the two exchanging garlands from the festivities has emerged online
